General.Name: Guoguang Electric Co Ltd Chengdu
General.Description: Guoguang Electric Co.,Ltd.Chengdu manufactures and sells microwave devices in China and internationally. It offers microwave electric vacuum devices, such as traveling wave tubes, magnetron, and inflatable microwave switch tubes; and microwave solid-state products, including switching networks, frequency conversion components, RF front-end, antenna interface module, multi-beam feed network, RF switching modules, power amplifiers, multi-function components, microwave extensions, and other microwave devices and components. The company also provides international thermonuclear experimental reactor (ITER) supporting equipment, special pumps, and valves for the nuclear industry; pressure vessel vacuum measurement and control components; vacuum switch chamber; interrupters; other civilian products. The company was formerly known as Guoguang Electron Tube General Factory. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Chengdu, China. Guoguang Electric Co.,Ltd. Chengdu is a subsidiary of Xinyu Huanuojin Enterprise Management Co., Ltd.
